Step Out: Walk to Stop Diabetes


Step Out takes place in 95 cities nationwide. With more than 100,000 walkers who are walking for so many, there are so many stories, and so many who have been touched by diabetes. It's your turn to share your story. Register today! »



 

Team Up


Teams come in all sizes and from different backgrounds. Whether you gather your friends, family, coworkers, or classmates, you can team up to Stop Diabetes!

Join a Team »

Be a Virtual Walker


Can't make it on the day of your local Step Out? No problem! You can still register - just pick "virtual walker during registration!



Find an Event Near You »

Join a National Team


The National Team Program is a great way for businesses, clubs, and organizations to help Stop Diabetes, while boosting employee morale and team-building skills.

See all National Teams »

Why We Walk:

National Teams
 

The National Team Program is a great way for businesses, clubs and organizations to help Stop Diabetes, while boosting employee morale and team-building skills. It gives companies an opportunity to form team across the U.S. to support the Association's mission.

Want to learn more about starting a National Team for your company or organization? Learn more about starting a national team or email Aimee Yrlas Simpson at asimpson@diabetes.org to get started!

Are you affiliated with one of the National Teams below? Make sure to select your company affiliation in the drop-down when registering your team.

How to be a Virtual Walker?

It's easy! Just find the Step Out you’d like to participate in locally, and at the beginning of registering choose the VIRTUAL WALKER registration option. That's it!
